name: Darell Thomas
description: 55y/o father of 2 ages 18 and 27 6’9 195lbs, don’t feel me move one! I am just me, average looking with a huge heart Single. divorced if you want to get specific I am educated, mature, fun, shy at first but am alot of fun once I know you.I seek friendsip first and foremost, we will go from there!Be in the USA unless you are planning on coming to my area,Be honest, self-sufficient , I have 2 kids of my own not looking for another. If you are into a man who is true to his woman, you have come to the right place. I am older and know how to treat a woman but more importantly know how a woman shall treat me.If you are prejudice, I am not for you.. I have biracial kids that will be accepted by the woman in my life… yet I do not discriminate! Just be real, no time for games!
